home.content:
Discover the sun's position in real-time along your route:

  • Where will the sun be: in your eyes? behind you? on the left? on the right?
  • Find the best seat to stay in the shade
  • Ensure your children's safety by choosing their side
  • Determine the position of the sunshade in the car for a hassle-free journey
  • Prepare the appropriate motorcycle gear and avoid glare

This free interactive tool guides you for a comfortable and safe journey.

Anticipate the sun's orientation based on the time of day and plan your trips with peace of mind.
